DOC.brief_summary: This study examine feasibility , practicality , utility usability semi-quantitative urine pregnancy test ( dBest One Step hCG Panel Test Kit ) recently approve food drug administration ( FDA ) Professional ( physician office ) over-the-counter ( consumer ) use . The study seek : 1 . Assess correlation pregnancy test result serum value ( distinct urine ) hCG . 2 . Assess whether time day urine collection impact outcome dBest test . 3 . Assess user comprehension pregnancy test , especially assessment result .
DOC.brief_title: Exploring Semi-Quantitative Pregnancy Tests Their Impact Reproductive Health Service Provision

Assess user comprehension pregnancy test , especially assessment result .
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year old , present early abortion , prenatal care , fertility service . If pregnant , gestational age < 84 day LMP , ultrasound clinical assessment . Agrees return followup visit willing provide address and/or telephone number purpose followup . Able consent study participation . Women le 18 year age . Women pregnant , except present IVF service .
